slider1_description: Track intelligent ideas & emerging themes packaged as simple stock and mutual fund baskets. Invest in right stocks/funds that make the cut and timely exit the ones that don’t.
slider2_title: Buy and Sell at Right Times
slider2_description: Improve returns and reduce risks using timely entry & exit notifications for baskets. Track unique market indicators to better manage short & long term investment allocations.
slider3_description: Stop navigating through tons of information, expert opinions, biases and noise, that confuse more than they help. Save Cost, Time & Effort in your investment decisions.
text_form_social: - Use your Facebook or Google account to Sign In -
text_stock_caption: Select ideas from the below that you believe in. Invest in right stocks that make the cut and timely exit the ones that don’t.
text_mf_caption: Select Mutual Fund baskets from below that suit your goals. Invest in the latest schemes and rebalance after atleast a year.
text_mi_caption: Select Market Indicators that you believe in. Enter and Exit equity markets at right times and reduce risks.
text_graph_in: Value of ₹100 invested in this basket compared to the benchmark over time
text_graph_us: Value of $100 invested in this basket compared to the benchmark over time
text_stock_subscribe: Subscribe to this basket and get instant updates on any changes in it’s composition. Timely invest in stocks that get selected and exit the ones that don’t.
text_mf_subscribe: Subscribe to this basket and get instant updates on any changes. Make fresh investments in the latest schemes listed below and rebalance after atleast a year.
text_tool_caption: Plan your investments to reach your financial targets with peace of mind. Select one of our tools below to help build your financial plan
text_retirement_planner_description: It is never too early to start planning for your retirement. Start early and stay ahead!
text_goal_planner_description: Get a financial plan for your life goals. It's always better to plan ahead so that you can make your every dream come true
text_portfolio_knowfund_description: Check how your funds are performing across various parameters
